name: Version name
deployment_status_empty: We do not have such a view anymore
environment_id_desc: This is your environment's id within your Agnost Cluster.
suspend_services_desc: Suspend access to the execution environment of this version. Version will be kept deployed but no requests will be handled
reactivate_services_desc: Reactivate access to the execution environment of this version.
redeploy_desc: Redeploy latest changes to the environment
auto_redeploy_desc: When version changes then deploy changes automatically
delete_rate_limiter_message: Are you sure you want to delete this rate limiter?, This action cannot be undone.

settings.version_id_desc: This is your version's id within your Agnost Cluster.
settings.version_name_desc: This is your version's name within your Agnost Cluster.
settings.read_only_desc: Set this version as read only. Other team members will be able to view this version but they will not be able to update it, except team members with Admin rights.
settings.private_desc: Set this version as private. Other team members will not be able to view this version, except team members with Admin rights.
settings.endpoint_rate_limit_desc: Rate limiting puts a cap on how often someone can call an endpoint of your app within a certain timeframe. By rate limiting, you can help stop certain kinds of malicious activity. You can define multiple rate limits which are applied sequentially.

error_message.label: Error Message
error_message.desc: Error message that will be returned to the calling party when the rate limit is exceeded
error_message.default: Too many requests, please try again later.

limiter_added_to_default: Rate limiter added to default rate limiters

middleware.name: Middleware Name
middleware.no_middleware_found: You have not defined any databases for this app version

npm.name: Package Name
npm.delete_modal_desc: Are you sure you want to delete this package? This action cannot be undone.

variable.delete_modal_desc: Are you sure you want to delete this variable? This action cannot be undone.

api_key.expire_date_desc: Expiration date of API key. For keys without any expiration leave it empty or clear existing value.
api_key.name: Key Name
api_key.all_domains_desc: Can be called from any domain
api_key.all_ips_desc: Can be called from any IP address
api_key.specified_domains_desc: Agnost can limit calls to "Authorized Domains" for application protection.
api_key.specified_ips_desc: Agnost can limit calls to "Authorized IPs" for application protection.
api_key.authorized_ips_desc: IPs that are allowed to use this API key. Leave blank to allow all IPs.
api_key.delete_modal_desc: Are you sure you want to delete this API Key? This action cannot be undone.
api_key.allow_realtime_desc: This API key can be used the font end clients to access realtime services (e.g., sending and receiving messages to and from channels)
api_key.endpoint_access_no_access_desc: The API key cannot be used to call application endpoints
api_key.endpoint_access_full_access_desc: API key can be used with all HTTP methods to view, create, update and delete data
api_key.endpoint_access_custom_allowed_desc: API key can only be used with below allowed endpoints only
api_key.endpoint_access_custom_excluded_desc: API key cannot be used with below excluded endpoints but with all others not selected
api_key.select_endpoint_desc: Click button below to select endpoint

realtime.activate_realtime_desc: Allow clients to publish messages to channels and subscribe them to listen incoming messages
realtime.api_key_required_desc: To use the realtime services of the platform, a vaild API key is required or not. If turned on then the API key needs to to have the "Allow realtime" option turned on.
realtime.session_required_desc: App users are required to be signed in (e.g., have a session token) to use the realtime services through Agnost client library.
realtime.rate_limiter_desc: Rate limiting puts a cap on how often someone can send realtime messages within a certain timeframe. By rate limiting, you can help stop certain kinds of malicious activity. You can define multiple rate limits which are applied sequentially
realtime.endpoint_access_custom_excluded_desc: API key cannot be used with below excluded endpoints but with all others not selected
